name: HUG THEM REAL GOOD
description:
You end up on a playground with only your spherical self and two arms. Arms that your potential friends don't have.

Befriend up to four cool kids by hugging them! And roll around, that's also fun.

Controls: you need keyboard and trackpad or a mouse with a scrollwheel.

Can also be played with a bend sensor on-site instead to satisfy your squeezing needs.

Made during Train Jam 2018 by Tim Sun and Mel Kim
